Statements.Statement: SELECT WorkshopId, WorkshopName FROM FA_tblWorkshops WHERE stop = 0 and BUID = @BUID
SELECT LocationID, LocationName FROM FA_tblLocations WHERE stop = 0 and BUID = @BUID
select ZoneId, ZoneName from BS_tblZoneList where stop = 0
update FA_tblMTNRequest set Status=2 where MTNRequestNum=@MTNRequestNum
SELECT UserName from UMS_tblUserAccount where UserID = 'HUAN'
SELECT UserID,UserName from UMS_tblUserAccount where Stop = 0
